name: Türkrarria
description:
Survival game same a little roguelike style but this version is a beta 1.0 and developing.

This game like Terraria beta 1.0  but makes Turks doing.

I'm waiting for your criticisms and bugs you find in the comments.

° Made in  🇹🇷. °

We're waiting your support. - Turkish developers

A.D - Movement

T- slow motion

R - items off

E,Q - sword & pickaxe

Space - Jump 

Mouse Leftclick (hold on) - if you are in pickaxe on the character hands: mining  or if you are in sword on the character hands : sword attack for on zombies

C - to lie down

Mouse Left Click for one click = dropping a dirt block on mouse location.(max = screen space line)

İnfo: Don't kill the wolf and sheep they are friendly and the blocks are using physic.
